name: Infomedia Yellow Pages
overview:
Infomedia Yellow pages Provides B2B & B2C Business Details, Contacts, Products, Services & Price Quotations for all Verticals in India.

Infomedia18 is the undisputed market leaders in Yellow Pages and Special Interest Publishing, and are one of the most respected contract printers in the country. With offices panning 25 Indian cities manned by an over 1,700-strong team, we have a national footprint, supplemented by a rock-solid all-India network for ad sales and distribution.

Infomedia18 now belongs to Network18 group which is undoubtedly India’s largest full play media companies with interests in television, print, internet, filmed entertainment and mobile content. Having multiple TV channels (CNN-IBN / CNBC TV18 , MTV , Colors) and websites including www.in.com, www.moneycontrol.com and having magazines like Overdrive, Chip, T3 India, Better Interiors, Better Photography, AV Max, SEARCH, Forbes, Entrepreneur, Network18 is the Number One media company in India.
